data.name: Western Guacamole
data.description: Chunky texture and homemade flavor seasoned with onion, red bell pepper and a touch of jalapeño

application.idea: Add Harvest Fresh™ Western Guacamole to a vegetarian wrap with white beans, red cabbage & cheddar.

data.name: Extreme Supreme®
data.description: Big avocado chunks with tomato, onion and cilantro for homemade texture and flavor.

application.idea: Mix Harvest Fresh™ Extreme Supreme® Guacamole with your favorite egg salad and serve on a pita with a side of fresh veggies.

data.name: Zesty Guacamole
data.description: Featuring a blend of peppers for the perfect kick to delight and excite.

application.idea: Add Harvest Fresh™ Zesty Guacamole to Mac n' Cheese for a creamy, spicy twist on a traditional favorite.

data.name: Especial
data.description: Perfectly ripened avocado chunks with jalapeño, cilantro, garlic, tomato and seasonings. Simply thaw, mash in the bag and serve.

application.idea: Top a flatbread with Harvest Fresh™ Especial Guacamole and veggies for an especially delicious flatbread.

data.name: Original Guacamole
data.description: A smooth blend, crafted with brined jalapeño pepper, onion, salt and garlic.

application.idea: Blend Harvest Fresh™ Original Guacamole into an Asian-inspired dressing and top over a shrimp and mango salad  for the perfect lunch or dinner.

data.name: Chunky Pulp
data.description: Made with only Hass avocados, lime juice concentrate and salt, this chunky pulp is versatile enough to top a burger, blend in a smoothie or mix into a house-made guacamole.

application.idea: Blend Harvest Fresh™ Chunky Avocado Pulp with fresh ginger, yogurt and mascarpone cheese for a sweet and creamy dressing to top mixed fruit or a spinach salad.

data.name: Chunky Pulp
data.description: Made with only Hass avocados, lime juice concentrate and salt, this chunky pulp is versatile enough to top a burger, blend in a smoothie or mix into a house-made guacamole.

application.idea: Blend Harvest Fresh™ Chunky Avocado Pulp with fresh ginger, yogurt and mascarpone cheese for a sweet and creamy dressing to top mixed fruit or a spinach salad.

data.name: Avocado Pulp
data.description: Made with only Hass avocados, lime juice concentrate and salt, this smooth pulp is the perfect base for a signature dip, dressing or sauce.

application.idea: Blend Harvest Fresh™ Avocado Pulp with butter, garlic and fresh lemon juice for a twist on the classic Italian garlic mayonnaise. Top a steak or add to a focaccia roll stacked with Italain meats, cheese and roasted red peppers.

data.name: Avocado Dices
data.description: Fresh Hass avocados, perfectly diced and ready for soups, salads and more.

application.idea: Add Harvest Fresh™ Avocado Dices to a rice bowl with mango and kimchee.

data.name: Avocado Halves (Puru)
data.description: Versatile Hass avocado halves ready for slicing, dicing or mashing for your signature guacamole.

application.idea: Fill a Harvest Fresh™ Avocado Half with spicy Andouille sausage, shrimp and sautéed pineapple for an unforgettable entrée.

data.name: Avocado Slices
data.description: Freshly sliced Hass avocados, with consistent thickness, are ideal for salads and sandwiches.

application.idea: Add Harvest Fresh™ Avocado Slices to a breakfast wrap filled with spicy potaoes and chopped hard boiled egg.
